command.text:
if @@admin <> 1 return
declare @id int select @id = id from @@sysDatabaseName..userinfo2 where name = @group select '' as field, '' as message, 'Treeview.Treeview.Update.CopyRight(' + rtrim(@@userID) + ',' + rtrim(@id) + ',' + @group + ',' + @target + ',' + '@@appDatabaseName' + ',' + @@language + ', false' + ')' as invoke, 'on$CopyRight$Completed(this);' as script return
